Introduction

Kim Soo-kyung (김수경), better known as Lua (루아), is the Main Dancer and Rapper of the girl group Weki Meki under Fantagio Music.

She debuted as a member of Weki Meki on August 8, 2017 with their first mini album "WEME".

In 2022, Lua made her debut as an actress in the play "Almost, Maine"
